attributes.action: Allow the PSNI to use deadly means in the aprehention of joyriders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to see the police force of nothern ireland to use more crude means of putting an end to the problem of joy riders in northern ireland , (as a deterent) at the minute the scum of society are getting let of with crimes of stealing cars and destroying them, i for one would like to see the police being able to open fire on them to get the vehicle to stop moving.
